name: WAVE ROYALE
description:
WAVE ROYALE

This is one idea (prototype) about mixing battle royale genre and vaporwave style.

The idea is to listen every sound, effect, and people around you... but this is not the best, the best is how you use your weapons!

You use your weapons with your VOICE, if you shout you shoot, but the enemys could hear you. 

The idea is to mix the silence, the sound, and the vaporwave style.  Also this game is not "serious", its more about humour.
